title: AutoZone - Automotive Parts E-commerce Platform
description: A modern, garage-themed automotive parts e-commerce platform built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features a bold red/white/black industrial design theme, comprehensive product catalog with vehicle-specific parts for Mazda CX-5, Toyota Prado, and Nissan X-Trail, fully functional shopping cart system, and responsive design optimized for automotive professionals and enthusiasts.
keyFeatures: Garage-themed industrial design with red/white/black color scheme
Fully functional shopping cart with persistent state
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Modern UI with smooth animations and transitions

title: Madaraka Hub - School Management System
description: A comprehensive, multi-role school management platform built with modern web technologies. Features role-based dashboards for administrators, teachers, students, parents, and staff with integrated attendance tracking, fee management, academic results, and real-time notifications. Designed for scalability and security with Row-Level Security (RLS) policies and comprehensive audit logging.
